description:
For gear-intensive travellers, this hard-sided case protects your gadgets with its impressive impact strength. It includes features like spherical wheels that roll along quietly and smoothly, and inner compartments and compression straps to keep you compact and organized on your travels.

  • Impact-resistant polycarbonate hardshell protects your gear from weather, temperature changes and rough handling
  • Smooth rolling Quadro 4-wheel system has durable rubber tread that rolls quietly
  • Light, strong retractable handle has a comfortable, coated grip
  • Zippered main compartment has easy to grab U-shaped pulls
  • TSA-approved zipper combination lock
  • Inner mesh pockets and compression straps to keep you organized
name: Gregory Quadro 22 Hardcase Roller - Unisex
